steps.name: POST: Add new pet to the store (Request URL: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet, body: {"id": 28, "category": {"id": 89403388, "name": "Jack Combs"}, "name": "Samantha Watkins", "photoUrls": ["https://placekitten.com/881/490"], "tags": [{"id": 83873, "name": "window"}], "status": "available"}
